ResearchProjectDef.label: cultivate mistletoe
ResearchProjectDef.description: Cultivate Matron's Mistletoe, a plant known for its medicinal value and used in alchemical potions that enhance healing and vitality.

ResearchProjectDef.label: cultivate lavender
ResearchProjectDef.description: Cultivate Shroud Lavender, a plant whose extracted oil is used in alchemical potions that ease aches and pains.

ResearchProjectDef.label: cultivate gil bun
ResearchProjectDef.description: Cultivate Gil Bun, a mushroom cultivated both for its culinary value as well as its use in alchemical potions that enhance strength and endurance.

ResearchProjectDef.label: cultivate belladonna
ResearchProjectDef.description: Cultivate Aldenard Belladonna, a highly toxic plant whose carefully extracted oil can be used in alchemical potions that enhance dexterity and agility.
